title: Handsomely Heartless
description: There's a darkness at Waversea College...but it isn't me.It was supposed to be easy. Infiltrate my father's college, force out the charity cases his investors are so fond of and burn this place to the ground. I was starting to enjoy myself too, bringing misery to those who had worked so hard to be here. But I never could have accounted for her.Harper has wormed her way into my soul, exposed my secrets and forced the darkness to turn on me. With Clayton finally gone, I should be celebrating. Instead I'm firmly on the path to self-destruction. Nothing feels as sweet as before, now that I'm subjected to hiding away with my demons. Sleep evades me but as I lie in the dark, I hear her soft voice ripping my façade to shreds in one sentence. 'Rhys Waversea is nothing and he knows it.'This is a M/F/M ménage story which is a part of the contemporary dark bully college romance genre. Trigger warning: dark love-hate themes, sexual scenes and bullying. Not suitable for under 18's.
author: Abigail Cole
